attributes.action: ensure illiterate adults with special needs have the same access to free basic skills education as every other adult.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has rightly made moves to ensure children with special needs, such as blind and deaf children, are able to develop and learn at the same rate as other children, (see recent response to Braille petition).  This petition campaigns for access to the same level of fully funded basic skills education for those adults with special needs who may have missed out in their early years, as every other adult receives.
